text: H: Transmitted to Governor.
S: Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 821).
H: Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 888).
H: Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cochran, Pierick excused (2).
S: Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none.  0 Excused: none.
S: 48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-30-25
S: Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 157).
H: Forty-eight (48) hours notice Wednesday, 04-30-25.
H: Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 157) as amended in (CD 1).

S: The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 2 Aye(s): Senator(s) Rhoads, Moriwaki; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Awa.

H: The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Tarnas, Yamashita, Poepoe, Takenouchi, Garcia; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.
H: Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Monday, 04-21-25 at 5:10PM in Conference Room 309.
H: Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Monday 04-21-25 2:05PM in conference room 325.
H: Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Thursday, 04-17-25 3:46PM in conference room 325.
H: Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 790).
S: Senate Conferees Appointed: Rhoads Chair; Moriwaki Co-Chair; Awa.
S: Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 732).
H: House Conferees Appointed: Tarnas, Yamashita Co-Chairs; Poepoe, Takenouchi, Garcia.
S: Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 704).
H: House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
H: Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No.  628) in amended form (SD 2).
S: Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD  2). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none .  Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none).  Transmitted to House.
S: 48 Hrs. Notice 04-08-25.
S: Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1841) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).

S: The committee(s) on  WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in WAM were as follows: 13 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Moriwaki, Aquino, DeCoite, Elefante, Hashimoto, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Kim, Lee, C., Wakai, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
S: The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-31-25 10:01AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.
S: Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
S: Reported from JDC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1253) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.

S: The committee(s) on  JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in JDC were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Rhoads, Gabbard, San Buenaventura, Awa; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Chang.
S: The committee(s) on JDC has scheduled a public hearing on 03-19-25 9:45AM; Conference Room 016 & Videoconference.
S: Referred to JDC, WAM.
S: Passed First Reading.
S: Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 382).
H: Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Alcos, Cochran, Holt, Sayama, Ward excused (5).  Transmitted to Senate.
H: Forty-eight (48) hours notice Wednesday,  03-12-25.
H: Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1171) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Third Reading.

H: The committee on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Takenouchi, Grandinetti, Holt, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Kitagawa, Kusch, Lamosao, Lee, M., Miyake, Morikawa, Templo, Alcos, Reyes Oda; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Hussey, Ward.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 03-05-25 9:00AM in House conference room 308 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Belatti, Cochran, Kila, Ward excused (4).
H: Reported from JHA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 286), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

H: The committee on JHA recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Tarnas, Poepoe, Belatti, Kahaloa, Perruso, Takayama, Garcia, Shimizu; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran, Hashem, Todd.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by JHA on Thursday, 01-30-25 2:00PM in House conference room 325 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

H: Introduced and Pass First Reading.
